name: Dunken Downhill 2: The Attack of Red's Plants
name_original: Dunken Downhill 2: The Attack of Red's Plants
description:
This is a sequel to Dunken Downhill. 

This game was made for the GBJAM 10.

In Dunken Downhill 2, Hard Mode has been replaced with Reverse Mode. Where you go up hill with remixed levels (so Harder Mode). 

Dr. Red's made a new formula and sent to towards Dunken's home, and he just wants to go to that new store. Now plants are attacking him. Can't Dunken get a brake today.

Controls

You must jump to move.

A or /\ to jump.

> to move left.

< to move right.

B or \/ to drop egg (when unlocked).
